info.title: Boxy

404.description: Community or post does not exist

200.description: Post types are returned from the community. Selects post types if it has query in it's name

message.example: Post type name should be unique

You have already liked the post

200.description: Removed like from the post successfully

message.example: You need to be a member of it's community to unlike this post
You need to like the post before you unlike

get.description: Search posts by tag or post types

200.description: Post search result. Select posts that has query in it's name

401.description: If the community is private you have to be a member of it to search posts

post.description: Advanced Search posts by tag or post types. Post request because we need a body

200.description: Post search result. Select posts that has query in it's name

400.description: You can not search fields if it doesn't exist in the post type

401.description: If the community is private you have to be a member of it to search posts

post.description: Create a comment for the post

message.example: You need to be a member of it's community to comment for this post

message.example: Community does not exist or post Type does not exist

delete.description: Deletes the post. Also deletes comments it has. You need to be the creator of the post or a moderator in it's community

401.description: You are not authorized to delete this post

delete.description: Delete a community. You need to be a moderator to delete a community. This operation also deletes posts, comments it has

post.description: Join to a community. You will be put into the pendingMembers list if the community is private
Join to community moderators. You will be put into the pendingModerators list and wait for a moderator to approve your request
Approve a community moderator join request
